name: compliance-monitoring-system
description: Comprehensive compliance monitoring and alerting system with AWS Lambda, EventBridge, SQS, SendGrid, and Slack integration

scripts.deploy:cloudformation: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file infrastructure/compliance-monitor-stack.yaml --stack-name compliance-monitor-$(date +%s) --parameter-overrides Environment=dev AdminEmail=admin@company.com
scripts.deploy:terraform: cd infrastructure && terraform init && terraform plan && terraform apply
scripts.package: cd lambda/monitor && npm install && cd ../alerts && npm install

author: Compliance Team
